title: Layoffs Continue in 2025 as AI and Tech Reshape Workforce
description: The trend of companies reducing their workforce persists into 2025, impacting various sectors, including tech, media, and finance. Driven by factors like technological advancements, particularly AI, and cost-cutting measures, companies like Amazon, Oracle, and CNN are implementing layoffs. Simultaneously, the World Economic Forum projects growth in tech jobs related to AI and big data by 2030.

title: Why Michael Burry is going short on AI

title: The rise of logistics startups in Southeast Asia: How AI powers supply-chain revolution
description: Southeast Asia is packed with numerous logistics landscape opportunities and operational hurdles. The growth opportunities are numerous for logistics startups in Southeast Asia. Meanwhile, they can face major difficulties too, such as inefficient routes, peak traffic, unpredictable weather, high last-mile delivery costs, demand fluctuations, inventory mismanagement, lack of real-time tracking, and high operating costs.
